workshoptitle: From zero to AI Agents hero with Oracle Private AI Agent Studio

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Learn to install and deploy Oracle Private AI Agent Studio
Lab 2: Configure OCI GenAI services and Oracle Autonomous Database
Lab 3: Create users, secure agents and authorize agent users
Lab 4: Privately Connect Your Own Data Sources to Boost AI Insights
Lab 5: Walk through building agentic RAG on custom enterprise data with secure access
Lab 6: Explore Data Analysis Agent to enable RAG on structured data (table/CSV) using variation analysis
Lab 7: Walk through the usage of the Template Gallery and Agent Builder features
